# vegan: an R package for community ecologists

Ordination methods, diversity analysis and other functions for community
and vegetation ecologists.

Website for the development version of the **vegan** package.

Vignettes are available on
[R-universe](https://vegandevs.r-universe.dev/vegan)

- [Introduction to ordination in
  vegan](https://vegandevs.r-universe.dev/vegan/doc/intro-vegan.pdf)
- [Partition of
  Variation](https://vegandevs.r-universe.dev/vegan/doc/partitioning.pdf)
- [Diversity analysis in
  vegan](https://vegandevs.r-universe.dev/vegan/doc/diversity-vegan.pdf)
- [Design decisions and
  implementation](https://vegandevs.r-universe.dev/vegan/doc/decision-vegan.pdf)
- [vegan FAQ](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/articles/FAQ-vegan.html)

# Installation

To install the development version of **vegan** you can use the usual
`git` and `R CMD build -> R CMD INSTALL` dance on the cloned repo (or
downloaded sources). You’ll need to be able to install packages from
source for that to work; if you don’t have the relevant developer tools,
you won’t be able to install **vegan** this way.

## Using **remotes**

If you do have the developer tools installed but don’t want the hassle
of keeping a local source code tree up-to-date, use the **remotes**
package:

``` r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("vegandevs/vegan")
```

## Installing binaries from R Universe

If you just want to install a binary version of the packages, just as
you would from CRAN, you can install from our R Universe repository. Run
the following in your R session:

``` r
install.packages('vegan',
    repos = c('https://vegandevs.r-universe.dev','https://cloud.r-project.org'))
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`BCI`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/BCI.md)
  [`BCI.env`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/BCI.md) :
  Barro Colorado Island Tree Counts
- [`CCorA()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/CCorA.md)
  [`biplot(`*`<CCorA>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/CCorA.md)
  : Canonical Correlation Analysis
- [`MDSaddpoints()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/MDSaddpoints.md)
  [`dist2xy()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/MDSaddpoints.md)
  : Add New Points to NMDS ordination
- [`MDSrotate()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/MDSrotate.md)
  : Rotate First MDS Dimension Parallel to an External Variable
- [`MOStest()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/MOStest.md)
  [`plot(`*`<MOStest>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/MOStest.md)
  [`fieller.MOStest()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/MOStest.md)
  [`profile(`*`<MOStest>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/MOStest.md)
  [`confint(`*`<MOStest>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/MOStest.md)
  : Mitchell-Olds and Shaw Test for the Location of Quadratic Extreme
- [`RsquareAdj(`*`<default>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/RsquareAdj.md)
  [`RsquareAdj(`*`<rda>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/RsquareAdj.md)
  [`RsquareAdj(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/RsquareAdj.md)
  : Adjusted R-square
- [`SSarrhenius()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/SSarrhenius.md)
  [`SSgleason()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/SSarrhenius.md)
  [`SSgitay()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/SSarrhenius.md)
  [`SSlomolino()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/SSarrhenius.md)
  : Self-Starting nls Species-Area Models
- [`add1(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/add1.cca.md)
  [`drop1(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/add1.cca.md)
  : Add or Drop Single Terms to a Constrained Ordination Model
- [`adipart()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/adipart.md)
  [`hiersimu()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/adipart.md)
  : Additive Diversity Partitioning and Hierarchical Null Model Testing
- [`adonis2()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/adonis.md) :
  Permutational Multivariate Analysis of Variance Using Distance
  Matrices
- [`anosim()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/anosim.md) :
  Analysis of Similarities
- [`anova(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/anova.cca.md)
  [`permutest(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/anova.cca.md)
  : Permutation Test for Constrained Correspondence Analysis, Redundancy
  Analysis and Constrained Analysis of Principal Coordinates
- [`avgdist()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/avgdist.md)
  : Averaged Subsampled Dissimilarity Matrices
- [`beals()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/beals.md)
  [`swan()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/beals.md) :
  Beals Smoothing and Degree of Absence
- [`betadisper()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/betadisper.md)
  [`anova(`*`<betadisper>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/betadisper.md)
  [`scores(`*`<betadisper>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/betadisper.md)
  [`eigenvals(`*`<betadisper>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/betadisper.md)
  [`plot(`*`<betadisper>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/betadisper.md)
  [`boxplot(`*`<betadisper>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/betadisper.md)
  [`TukeyHSD(`*`<betadisper>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/betadisper.md)
  [`print(`*`<betadisper>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/betadisper.md)
  [`betadistances()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/betadisper.md)
  : Multivariate homogeneity of groups dispersions (variances)
- [`betadiver()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/betadiver.md)
  [`plot(`*`<betadiver>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/betadiver.md)
  [`scores(`*`<betadiver>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/betadiver.md)
  : Indices of beta Diversity
- [`bgdispersal()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/bgdispersal.md)
  : Coefficients of Biogeographical Dispersal Direction
- [`bioenv(`*`<default>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/bioenv.md)
  [`bioenv(`*`<formula>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/bioenv.md)
  [`bioenvdist()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/bioenv.md)
  : Best Subset of Environmental Variables with Maximum (Rank)
  Correlation with Community Dissimilarities
- [`biplot(`*`<rda>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/biplot.rda.md)
  : PCA biplot
- [`cascadeKM()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cascadeKM.md)
  [`cIndexKM()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cascadeKM.md)
  [`plot(`*`<cascadeKM>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cascadeKM.md)
  : K-means partitioning using a range of values of K
- [`cca(`*`<formula>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cca.md)
  [`rda(`*`<formula>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cca.md)
  [`cca(`*`<default>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cca.md)
  [`rda(`*`<default>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cca.md)
  [`ca()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cca.md)
  [`pca()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cca.md) :
  \[Partial\] \[Constrained\] Correspondence Analysis and Redundancy
  Analysis
- [`ordConstrained()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cca.object.md)
  [`ordiYbar()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cca.object.md)
  [`model.frame(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cca.object.md)
  [`model.matrix(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cca.object.md)
  [`weights(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/cca.object.md)
  : Result Object from Constrained Ordination
- [`clamtest()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/clamtest.md)
  [`summary(`*`<clamtest>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/clamtest.md)
  [`plot(`*`<clamtest>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/clamtest.md)
  : Multinomial Species Classification Method (CLAM)
- [`commsim()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/commsim.md)
  [`make.commsim()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/commsim.md)
  [`print(`*`<commsim>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/commsim.md)
  : Create an Object for Null Model Algorithms
- [`contribdiv()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/contribdiv.md)
  [`plot(`*`<contribdiv>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/contribdiv.md)
  : Contribution Diversity Approach
- [`dbrda()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/dbrda.md)
  [`capscale()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/dbrda.md)
  [`pco()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/dbrda.md) :
  Principal Coordinates Analysis and \[Partial\] Distance-based
  Redundancy Analysis
- [`decorana()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/decorana.md)
  [`plot(`*`<decorana>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/decorana.md)
  [`text(`*`<decorana>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/decorana.md)
  [`points(`*`<decorana>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/decorana.md)
  [`scores(`*`<decorana>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/decorana.md)
  [`downweight()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/decorana.md)
  : Detrended Correspondence Analysis and Basic Reciprocal Averaging
- [`decostand()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/decostand.md)
  [`wisconsin()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/decostand.md)
  [`decobackstand()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/decostand.md)
  : Standardization Methods for Community Ecology
- [`designdist()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/designdist.md)
  [`designdist2()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/designdist.md)
  [`chaodist()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/designdist.md)
  : Design your own Dissimilarities
- [`deviance(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/deviance.cca.md)
  [`extractAIC(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/deviance.cca.md)
  : Statistics Resembling Deviance and AIC for Constrained Ordination
- [`dispindmorisita()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/dispindmorisita.md)
  : Morisita index of intraspecific aggregation
- [`dispweight()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/dispweight.md)
  [`gdispweight()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/dispweight.md)
  [`summary(`*`<dispweight>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/dispweight.md)
  : Dispersion-based weighting of species counts
- [`distconnected()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/distconnected.md)
  [`no.shared()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/distconnected.md)
  : Connectedness of Dissimilarities
- [`diversity()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/diversity.md)
  [`simpson.unb()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/diversity.md)
  [`fisher.alpha()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/diversity.md)
  [`specnumber()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/diversity.md)
  : Ecological Diversity Indices
- [`dune`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/dune.md)
  [`dune.env`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/dune.md) :
  Vegetation and Environment in Dutch Dune Meadows.
- [`dune.taxon`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/dune.taxon.md)
  [`dune.phylodis`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/dune.taxon.md)
  : Taxonomic Classification and Phylogeny of Dune Meadow Species
- [`eigenvals()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/eigenvals.md)
  [`summary(`*`<eigenvals>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/eigenvals.md)
  : Extract Eigenvalues from an Ordination Object
- [`envfit(`*`<default>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/envfit.md)
  [`envfit(`*`<formula>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/envfit.md)
  [`plot(`*`<envfit>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/envfit.md)
  [`scores(`*`<envfit>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/envfit.md)
  [`vectorfit()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/envfit.md)
  [`factorfit()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/envfit.md)
  : Fits an Environmental Vector or Factor onto an Ordination
- [`eventstar()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/eventstar.md)
  : Scale Parameter at the Minimum of the Tsallis Evenness Profile
- [`fisherfit()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/fisherfit.md)
  [`prestonfit()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/fisherfit.md)
  [`prestondistr()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/fisherfit.md)
  [`plot(`*`<prestonfit>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/fisherfit.md)
  [`lines(`*`<prestonfit>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/fisherfit.md)
  [`veiledspec()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/fisherfit.md)
  [`as.fisher()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/fisherfit.md)
  [`plot(`*`<fisher>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/fisherfit.md)
  [`as.preston()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/fisherfit.md)
  [`plot(`*`<preston>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/fisherfit.md)
  [`lines(`*`<preston>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/fisherfit.md)
  : Fit Fisher's Logseries and Preston's Lognormal Model to Abundance
  Data
- [`goodness(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/goodness.cca.md)
  [`inertcomp()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/goodness.cca.md)
  [`spenvcor()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/goodness.cca.md)
  [`intersetcor()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/goodness.cca.md)

  [`alias(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/goodness.cca.md)
  : Diagnostic Tools for \[Constrained\] Ordination (CCA, RDA, DCA, CA,
  PCA)

  [`stressplot(`*`<default>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/goodness.metaMDS.md)
  : Goodness of Fit and Shepard Plot for Nonmetric Multidimensional
  Scaling

  : Indicator Power of Species
- [`hatvalues(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/influence.cca.md)
  [`rstandard(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/influence.cca.md)
  [`rstudent(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/influence.cca.md)
  [`cooks.distance(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/influence.cca.md)
  [`influence(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/influence.cca.md)
  [`sigma(`*`<cca>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/influence.cca.md)

  : Kendall coefficient of concordance
- [`linestack()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/linestack.md)
  : Plots One-dimensional Diagrams without Overwriting Labels
- [`make.cepnames()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/make.cepnames.md)
  : Abbreviates a Two-Part Botanical or Zoological Latin Name into
  Character String

  [`plot(`*`<mantel.correlog>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/mantel.correlog.md)
  : Mantel Correlogram
- [`metaMDS()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/metaMDS.md)
  [`plot(`*`<metaMDS>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/metaMDS.md)
  [`points(`*`<metaMDS>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/metaMDS.md)
  [`text(`*`<metaMDS>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/metaMDS.md)
  [`scores(`*`<metaMDS>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/metaMDS.md)
  [`metaMDSdist()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/metaMDS.md)
  [`metaMDSiter()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/metaMDS.md)
  [`initMDS()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/metaMDS.md)
  [`postMDS()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/metaMDS.md)
  [`metaMDSredist()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/metaMDS.md)
  : Nonmetric Multidimensional Scaling with Stable Solution from Random
  Starts, Axis Scaling and Species Scores
- [`mite`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/mite.md)
  [`mite.env`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/mite.md)
  [`mite.pcnm`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/mite.md)
  [`mite.xy`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/mite.md) :
  Oribatid Mite Data with Explanatory Variables
- [`monoMDS()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/monoMDS.md)
  [`scores(`*`<monoMDS>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/monoMDS.md)
  [`plot(`*`<monoMDS>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/monoMDS.md)
  [`points(`*`<monoMDS>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/monoMDS.md)
  [`text(`*`<monoMDS>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/monoMDS.md)
  : Global and Local Non-metric Multidimensional Scaling and Linear and
  Hybrid Scaling
- [`mrpp()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/mrpp.md)
  [`meandist()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/mrpp.md)
  [`summary(`*`<mrpp>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/mrpp.md)
  [`summary(`*`<meandist>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/mrpp.md)
  [`plot(`*`<meandist>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/mrpp.md)
  : Multi Response Permutation Procedure and Mean Dissimilarity Matrix
- [`mso()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/mso.md)
  [`msoplot()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/mso.md) :
  Functions for performing and displaying a spatial partitioning of cca
  or rda results
- [`multipart()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/multipart.md)
  : Multiplicative Diversity Partitioning
- [`nestedchecker()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/nestedtemp.md)
  [`nestedn0()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/nestedtemp.md)
  [`nesteddisc()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/nestedtemp.md)
  [`nestedtemp()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/nestedtemp.md)
  [`nestednodf()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/nestedtemp.md)
  [`nestedbetasor()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/nestedtemp.md)

  : Nestedness Indices for Communities of Islands or Patches

  : Internal vegan functions
- [`vegan-package`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/vegan-package.md)
  [`vegan`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/vegan-package.md)
  : Community Ecology Package: Ordination, Diversity and Dissimilarities
- [`vegdist()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/vegdist.md)
  : Dissimilarity Indices for Community Ecologists
- [`vegemite()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/vegemite.md)
  [`tabasco()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/vegemite.md)
  [`coverscale()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/vegemite.md)
  : Display Compact Ordered Community Tables
- [`wascores()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/wascores.md)
  [`eigengrad()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/wascores.md)
  [`scores(`*`<wascores>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/wascores.md)
  : Weighted Averages Scores for Species
- [`wcmdscale()`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/wcmdscale.md)
  [`plot(`*`<wcmdscale>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/wcmdscale.md)
  [`scores(`*`<wcmdscale>`*`)`](https://vegandevs.github.io/vegan/reference/wcmdscale.md)
  : Weighted Classical (Metric) Multidimensional Scaling
